data.message: used to be great... could play games or do just about anything on facebook... now you have to download multiple apps just to do anything..... ie to play angry birds friends... I now have to use the "gamesroom" app.... or use facebook messenger to have a simple conversation with a friend. total BS.

replies.message: We're sorry you feel that way, Michael. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2konKiG. -Joe
give me back the option to play games without having to go through the gamesroom app and I'll be happy... until then.. not so much.
